1 
  2 (function($){
  3 
  4 if(typeof console === "undefined") {
  5     console = { log: function() { } };
  6 }
  7 
  8 // Publisher/subscriber event system
  9 var Events = {
 10     PAGECHANGE: "Page_stateChange",
 11     PORTLETCHANGE: "Portlet_stateChange",
 12     NEWPORTLET: "Catalog_newPortlet",
 13     bind: function(eventName, callback) {
 14         $(document).bind(this._getName(eventName), callback);
 15     },
 16     trigger: function(eventName, data) {
 17         $(document).trigger(this._getName(eventName), data);
 18     },
 19     unbind: function(eventName){
 20         $(document).unbind(this._getName(eventName));
 21     },
 22     _getName: function(data) {
 23         if (typeof data == "object" && typeof data.join == "function")
 24             return data.join(" ");
 25         return data;
 26     }
 27 };
 28 
 29 if (!window.capsule) window.capsule = {};
 30 window.capsule.Events = Events;
 31 
 32 })(jQuery);
 33
